name: CableCast
description: Create virtual cable TV channels with continuous programming, commercials, and pre-rolls from your Jellyfin library
overview: CableCast allows you to create virtual cable TV channels that play content from your Jellyfin libraries in a continuous, TV-like experience. Features include commercial insertion, pre-roll content, schedule-based or continuous programming, and content filtering.

versions.changelog:
Initial release of CableCast plugin:
- Create virtual cable TV channels
- Schedule-based and continuous programming
- Commercial insertion between content
- Pre-roll content support
- Content filtering by genre, rating, year, etc.
- RESTful API for channel management
- Background service for continuous operation
